articles.description: All the latest football news and updates as wholesale changes made to England squad plus latest on referee David Coote.
articles.title: Rogers in as eight players withdraw from England squad plus Coote latest

articles.description: Sam Koch looked like he was playing very, very badly. In fact, he was changing one of sport's strangest positions for ever.
articles.title: NFL: How Sam Koch changed punting with 'mis-kicks'

articles.description: Premier League referee David Coote is suspended with immediate effect by refereeing body PGMOL.
articles.title: David Coote: Premier League referee suspended over alleged anti-Liverpool video.

articles.description: The broadcaster has hosted the corporation's flagship football show Match of the Day since 1999.
articles.title: Gary Lineker: BBC Match of the Day host to leave at end of season

articles.description: Spanish football writer Guillem Balague talks to former Barcelona and Spain midfielder Andres Iniesta about his plans after retiring.
articles.title: Andres Iniesta: From shy schoolboy to Spain's most decorated player - what next for Barcelona legend?

articles.description: Cleveland Cavaliers become just the eighth team in NBA history to win the first 12 games of a regular season with a 119-113 victory over the Chicago Bulls.
articles.title: NBA round-up: Cleveland Cavaliers continue winning run with victory over Chicago Bulls

articles.description: India has informed the International Cricket Council it will not travel to the Champions Trophy, according to hosts Pakistan.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: India will not travel to Pakistan, says PCB

articles.description: Aston Villa's Morgan Rogers is called up to England's squad for November’s Nations League internationals after eight players withdraw through injury.
articles.title: England: Morgan Rogers called into Three Lions squad as eight players withdraw through injury

articles.description: Ruud van Nistelrooy leaves Manchester United after not being given a role in new manager Ruben Amorim's backroom staff.
articles.title: Ruud van Nistelrooy: Dutchman exits Man Utd as new manager Ruben Amorim decides not to keep him in backroom staff

articles.description: The Miami Dolphins end a three-game losing streak and keep their faint play-off hopes alive with a 23-15 win over the Los Angeles Rams.
articles.title: NFL results: Miami Dolphins end losing run with win over Los Angeles Rams
